segments.text: There are so many flavors of ice cream to choose from !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , there must be about a hundred . Do you have a favorite ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I love fruit flavored ices the best .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know , fresh fruit flavored is the best ever .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What is your least favorite ice cream ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't like peppermint ice cream .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , I know what you mean .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: One time , I tried garlic ice cream .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That doesn't sound like a good choice for today though . Let's order !
segments.speaker: S2
